name: wnr
description: It's a timer app with strong expansibility for computers. The name is an abbr of "Work and Rest".

scripts.electron: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy electron && npx cap open electron
scripts.win: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy electron && cd electron && yarn run win && cd ../
scripts.mac: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy electron && cd electron && mac && cd ../
scripts.linux: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy electron && cd electron && linux && cd ../
scripts.android: vue-cli-service build --mode android && npx cap copy android && npx cap open android
scripts.web: vue-cli-service build --mode web && npx cap serve

author: RoderickQiu
